name: Forsaken (itch) (Muhaiminul Yeamin)
description:
Forsaken is a narrative  based platformer game made for Hack-A-Jam-2021.

Disclaimer: The game has a bug where the subtitles start flickering/disappearing suddenly. We were unable to fix this issue. We are really sorry for the inconvenience.

Story: In the game, the protagonist who was cursed, lives in a world where two race, Beings of Light and Darklings coexist together.  But the Darklings suddenly waged war on the Beings of Light without any specific reason. Many years after the war, our Protagonist, a Being of Light, was cursed with being a half breed due to unknown reasons. He/She was thrown out of the Realm of Light. He/She is now seeking shelter in the Deep where the Darklings live.

Developed by: Muhaiminul Yeamin

Illustrations and Assets: Salman Farsi Rifat

Music: Myuu - Remnants

Voice Lines: Tacotron 2 (Pre-Trained model of Sage from Valorant)

Note: Due to a personal emergency we were unable to work on the game for 2 whole days. So the game was entirely made in 3 days. If you face any bugs or glitches, we are extremely sorry.

Unity Project: https://github.com/MY-Sabil/forsaken-game

Thank you for playing our game. If you enjoy kindly rate the game in the jam page.
